languages.text: "Помни, брат! Последний луч солнца, что ты узришь, будет только твоим, не разделенным ни с кем, священным Последним восходом!" — возопил одинокий голос безымянного еретика из молчаливой толпы. Поддаваясь воле чьих-то рук, линза повернулась, и луч, сфокусированный ею, впился в глаза пленника!

traits.locale_text: "Помни, брат! Последний луч солнца, что ты узришь, будет только твоим, не разделенным ни с кем, священным Последним восходом!" — возопил одинокий голос безымянного еретика из молчаливой толпы. Поддаваясь воле чьих-то рук, линза повернулась, и луч, сфокусированный ею, впился в глаза пленника!

languages.text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!
languages.original_text: "Помни, брат! Последний луч солнца, что ты узришь, будет только твоим, не разделенным ни с кем, священным Последним восходом!" — возопил одинокий голос безымянного еретика из молчаливой толпы. Поддаваясь воле чьих-то рук, линза повернулась, и луч, сфокусированный ею, впился в глаза пленника!

traits.locale_text: "Remember, brother! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a nameless heretic's lone voice amid the silent crowd. By the action of someone's hands, the lens turned, and its focused ray struck the prisoner's eyes!

"Remember, brother! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a nameless heretic's lone voice amid the silent crowd. By the action of someone's hands, the lens turned, and its focused ray struck the prisoner's eyes!

"Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens has turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

"Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens has turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

"Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

"Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

languages.text: "Denkt daran, Kamerad! Der letzte Sonnenstrahl, den Ihr erblickt, gehört nur Euch, Ihr teilt ihn mit niemandem — Eure heilige Letzte Dämmerung!", rief die Stimme eines einzelnen Ketzers aus der stummen Menge. Durch jemandes Hände bewegt, drehte sich die Linse, und ihr fokussierter Strahl labte sich an den Augen des Gefangenen!
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: "Denkt daran, Kamerad! Der letzte Sonnenstrahl, den Ihr erblickt, gehört nur Euch, Ihr teilt ihn mit niemandem — Eure heilige Letzte Dämmerung!", rief die Stimme eines einzelnen Ketzers aus der stummen Menge. Durch jemandes Hände bewegt, drehte sich die Linse, und ihr fokussierter Strahl labte sich an den Augen des Gefangenen!

languages.text: « Souviens-toi, camarade ! Le dernier rayon de soleil que tu contempleras n'appartiendra qu'à toi, tu ne le partageras avec personne d'autre, ce sera ton Aube finale sacrée ! », hurle une voix hérétique solitaire au milieu de la foule silencieuse. Des mains font tourner la lentille et son rayon focalisé brûle les yeux du prisonnier !
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: « Souviens-toi, camarade ! Le dernier rayon de soleil que tu contempleras n'appartiendra qu'à toi, tu ne le partageras avec personne d'autre, ce sera ton Aube finale sacrée ! », hurle une voix hérétique solitaire au milieu de la foule silencieuse. Des mains font tourner la lentille et son rayon focalisé brûle les yeux du prisonnier !

languages.text: “记住，兄弟！你最后看到的阳光将只属于你自己，不会与其他人分享。这就是神圣的终末黎明，它只属于你！”其中一个异端分子咆哮起来，他的吼声在寂静的人群中回响。有人转动了透镜，它聚焦的光线照在了那个囚犯的眼睛上！
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: “记住，兄弟！你最后看到的阳光将只属于你自己，不会与其他人分享。这就是神圣的终末黎明，它只属于你！”其中一个异端分子咆哮起来，他的吼声在寂静的人群中回响。有人转动了透镜，它聚焦的光线照在了那个囚犯的眼睛上！

languages.text: 「忘れるな、同志よ！お前が見る最後の陽光は、お前だけのものであり、他の誰とも共有することはない！お前の聖なる最後の夜明けだ！」静まり返った群衆の中で、一人の異端者の声が高らかに響いた。何者かの手によってレンズが回転し、光線の焦点が囚人の目に注いだ！
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: 「忘れるな、同志よ！お前が見る最後の陽光は、お前だけのものであり、他の誰とも共有することはない！お前の聖なる最後の夜明けだ！」静まり返った群衆の中で、一人の異端者の声が高らかに響いた。何者かの手によってレンズが回転し、光線の焦点が囚人の目に注いだ！

languages.text: «¡Recuerda, camarada! El último rayo de sol que contemples será solo tuyo, no lo compartirás con nadie más: ¡el sagrado Amanecer Final!», bramó la voz de un hereje solitario en medio de la multitud silenciosa. Las manos de alguien han hecho girar la lente, ¡y su rayo de luz se ha dado un festín con los ojos del prisionero!
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: «¡Recuerda, camarada! El último rayo de sol que contemples será solo tuyo, no lo compartirás con nadie más: ¡el sagrado Amanecer Final!», bramó la voz de un hereje solitario en medio de la multitud silenciosa. Las manos de alguien han hecho girar la lente, ¡y su rayo de luz se ha dado un festín con los ojos del prisionero!

languages.text: "Unutma yoldaş! Gördüğün son gün ışığı sadece senin olacak, başka kimseyle paylaşılmayacak. O ışık, kutsal Nihai Şafak'ın olacak." Sessiz kalabalığın ortasından yalnız bir kâfirin sesi gürledi. Bir el, merceği döndürdü; mahkûmun gözlerini odaklanmış ışık ile yıkadı!
languages.original_text: "Remember, comrade! The last sunray you behold will be yours only, shared with no one else — your holy Final Dawn!" bellowed a lone heretic's voice amid the silent crowd. By the doing of someone's hands, the lens had turned, and its focused ray feasted on the prisoner's eyes!

traits.locale_text: "Unutma yoldaş! Gördüğün son gün ışığı sadece senin olacak, başka kimseyle paylaşılmayacak. O ışık, kutsal Nihai Şafak'ın olacak," diye gürledi sessiz kalabalığın ortasından yalnız bir kâfirin sesi. Bir el, merceği döndürdü; mahkûmun gözlerini odaklanmış ışık ile yıkadı!
